title: Exchange Programme in Singapore
description: I spent a semester abroad in Asia's top university (QS World University Rankings 2020) to study my minor in Communications and Psychology.

title: Honours Programme Delft
description: The Honours Programme Delft is an additional program for students with higher than average performance. This program is designed for students to develop in-depth knowledge of highly technical subjects, work on a research project, and sharpen academic skills such as writing and debating.

title: BSc - Computer Science and Engineering
description: I am currently in my third and last year bachelor's in Computer Science and Engineering in the Netherlands. I followed the Data Science track with extra courses in Computational Intelligence, Big Data Processing, and Data Mining. Current GPA of 8.7/10 (minimum requirement for "cum laude" predicate: 8/10).

title: Secondary School - Science-Mathematics
description: I got my secondary school diploma in Belgium in Dutch. Followed Science and Mathematics track, with extra specialization in Mathematics (8 hours a week).
